content: the pine grove pullover is a cozy and stylish crochet sweater featuring gorgeous texture and effortless wearability side slits add comfort and movement making it perfect for layering while shown in a beautiful green the yarn offers plenty of color options to suit your style a step-by-step video tutorial is included to guide you through every stitch this pattern is free on my blog 1 a lion brand kit is available 2 it comes with all the yarn needed to make your sweater plus a free copy of the pdf digital download of the pattern you can also customize your yarn color a full video tutorial is available and included in the pattern 3 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/the-pine-grove-pullover-crochet-pattern/ 2 http //shrsl com/4udz8 3 https //youtu be/vrzlcucm3ly
